import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import { FiEdit } from "react-icons/fi"; import { Links } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import MetaData from '../layout/MetaData'; import Loader from '../layout/Loader' const Profile = () => { const { user, loading } = useSelector(state => state.auth) return ( {loading ? : (

  • Nama Pengguna

    {user.name}

  • E-mail

    {user.email}
)} ) } export default Profile
